name: Backtrack (itch) (David Byttow)
description:
Hello there.

This is a game about making choices. But unlike real life, you can rewind time and try again. Wouldn't that be nice?

Only red blocks may be recorded, good luck!

Controls

  • Move = AD or Arrow Keys
  • Jump = [Space]
  • Record = [R]
  • Reset = [Tab]
